    • Method Detail

      • validateScope

        public abstract boolean validateScope(OAuthTokenReqMessageContext tokReqMsgCtx)
                               throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        Method to validate the scopes associated with the access token against the resource that is being accessed.
        Parameters:
        tokReqMsgCtx - message context of the token request.
        Returns:
        true if scope is valid, false otherwise
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - if error occurs while scope validation.

      • canHandle

        public abstract boolean canHandle(OAuthTokenReqMessageContext tokReqMsgCtx)
        Checks whether a given scopes can be handled by the scope handler.
        Parameters:
        tokReqMsgCtx - message context of the token request.
        Returns:
        true if the given scopes can be validated, otherwise false.
